title: AI Industry Regulatory Capture Network 2023-2025
description: Investigate the systematic capture of AI governance and safety institutions by major AI companies including OpenAI, Anthropic, Meta, and Google. Focus on how 'AI safety' narratives mask oligarchic control of critical infrastructure, including academic partnerships, regulatory body infiltration, and the creation of barriers to entry that consolidate market power.
research_notes: Emerging threat - oligarchic capture of transformative technology governance
